thread.section_title: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services | beliteweight.com
thread.title: Melissa P.
thread.title_full: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services reviewed by Melissa P.

author: Melissa P.
title: Melissa P.
text: Amazing experience. Jorge AKA the butler was a rockstar so helpful and kind. Dr. Rod is a master. The transportation service that picks you up at the airport was waiting for me when I came off the plane! So friendly! LOVE LOVE LOVE the shuttle guys. Very supportive and kind. Surgery was smooth no complication, flew home was back to work in 3 days:) Jess my surgery coordinator was always available prior to my surgery. I would recommend this team to anyone!
